name: RubeGoldberg (Hah-Young)
description: My first exercise was to create a rube goldberg machine. This was my first time using Unity and getting used to the interface so I explored and experimented with the physics engine and kept the rubegoldberg machine simple. The goal is to get the white spheres onto the rainbow platforms. The machine has several chain reactions like dominoes, levers, and a slide.  The rainbow texture was found from Google images
